field.name: description
field.value:
I double click on things quite a bit to highlight words for copying etc. Dbl-Click, ctrl-c, click elsewhere (sometimes double-click if I'm replacing a word and want to select it), and then ctrl-v.
I "think" that since I installed your colorizer it's broken this in .vm and .njs files. (It might have been broken earlier in these files, but I suspect it wasn't). I'm guessing this has something to do with identifying tokens which I think the guts of your colorizer would be doing.
I use double clicking a lot, and this has slowed me down a bit, therefore major priority. Maybe should be minor as there is a work around or two. ;-)
